Body:
Hello James,

Here’s another cool hack! Want to apply for a scholarship but don't
have time to apply right now? You can favorite ❤️ the scholarship
to save it for later! When you're ready to apply, quickly find your
favorites by selecting the “Saved Scholarships” tab! Check it out:

[

Take me to my ScholarshipOwl account! [

Talk soon! 

Jelena

Product Manager | ScholarshipOwl

P.S. Recently, we've renamed the “Picked Scholarships” tab into
“Saved Scholarships” for a better understanding!

If you don't want to hear from me again... _Unsubscribe here_
